page.title: 02WALTHAMSTOW LIFESTYLES.
page.content: There are a number of different houses in Walthamstow. They range from Tower Blocks to Terraced Houses. The number of bedrooms is mainly 3/4. If you ever happen to be in an Estate Agentsyou will notice that the prices of some of the houses are ridiculously high,but some are at a reasonable price.A lot of the houses in Walthamstow are quite old but they are very well built. Some of the houses which are only a few years old have formed cracks.That is because bricks nowadays are hollow and weak.The houses in some parts of Walthamstow could be improved. Another problem is litter. Litter is absolutely everywhere;people throw it where they please,just when they are approaching a litter bin. People just don't care.
